section.heading: Waiving of building fines for outdoor eating and learning.
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, if the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs does not issue a permit to a LEA for the building of outdoor eating and learning structures or equipment within 3 weeks of receiving the application for the permit from the LEA, all fines associated with building the outdoor eating and learning structures or equipment shall be waived.
